label: A2B_oP12_62_2c_c-010
title: $C53$ (SrBr$_{2}$) Structure ({\em Obsolete})
comments:
(Kamermans, 1939) determined that SrBr$_{2}$ had a distorted \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_oP12_62_2c_c-003}{PbCl$_{2}$ structure} and assigned it to space group $Pnma$ \#62. (Hermann, 1939) gave this the {\em Strukturbericht} designation $C53$. 
 Some years later (Sass, 1963) showed that this structure was incorrect, and that \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_tP30_85_ab2g_cg-001}{$\alpha$-SrBr$_{2}$} was actually in space group $P4/n$ \#85, rendering the $C53$ symbol obsolete.  We include it here for historical interest. 
 (Kamermans, 1939) gave the atomic positions in terms of the $Pbnm$ setting of space group \#62.  We have used FINDSYM to translate this to the standard $Pnma$ setting. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_oP12_62_2c_c-003}{PbCl$_{2}$ ($C23$)}, \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_oP12_62_2c_c-002}{HgCl$_{2}$ ($C25$)}, \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_oP12_62_2c_c-004}{SrH$_{2}$ ($C29$)}, \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_oP12_62_2c_c-001}{Co$_{2}$Si ($C37$)}, and \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_oP12_62_2c_c-010}{SrBr$_{2}$ ($C53$)} all share the same AFLOW label, A2B\_oP12\_62\_2c\_c. The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
